text: The Palin family is back on reality TV. Although they say they dislike media elites, the Palins have a long history with TV shows. After Sarah Palin ’ s failed bid for vice president in 2008, she landed a TLC series, “ Sarah Palin ’ s Alaska. ” Later, she starred in the Sportsman Channel ’ s “ Amazing America With Sarah Palin. ” Her husband, Todd, competed on NBC ’ s “ Stars Earn Stripes. ” But their eldest daughter, Bristol, seems to love reality TV the most : She was on “ Dancing With the Stars ” twice and had her own Lifetime show, “ Life ’ s a Tripp. ” And starting this week, she made her debut on the seventh season premiere of “ Teen Mom OG, ” a spinoff of the hit
